mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.ORDER_SORT ASC, A.creation_date ASC, A.SEQ DESC) AS ROWNUM, A.seq, A.PLAY_GUBUN, A.ORDER_SORT, A.LINK_URL, A.USE_YN, A.atch_file_id, A.creation_user, A.creation_date, B.file_stre_cours, B.stre_file_nm, B.orignl_file_nm FROM CO_BannerManage A LEFT OUTER JOIN CO_ComfileDetail B ON B.atch_file_id = A.atch_file_id WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY A.ORDER_SORT ASC, A.creation_date ASC, A.SEQ DESC;
SELECT A.seq, A.PLAY_GUBUN, A.ORDER_SORT, A.LINK_URL, A.USE_YN, A.atch_file_id FROM CO_BannerManage A LEFT OUTER JOIN CO_ComfileDetail B ON B.atch_file_id = A.atch_file_id WHERE seq = #{seq}
